com.austinv11.collectiveframework.language.translation

Interface ITranslationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    YandexProvider

    public interface ITranslationProvider
    Class for a translation provider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canDetectLanguage()
      Used by the TranslationManager internally
      java.lang.String detectLangauge(java.lang.String text)
      Method to detect the language from a string, only used if canDetectLanguage() returns true
      java.lang.String getProviderName()
      Method for receiving the name of the translation provider
      java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String toLang)

      Method to actually translate

      • getProviderName

        java.lang.String getProviderName()
        Method for receiving the name of the translation provider
        Returns:
        The name, like "Google Translate"

                         java.lang.String fromLang,

                           throws TranslationException,
                                  QueryLimitException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Method to actually translate
        Parameters:
        text - Text to translate
        fromLang - Language to translate from
        toLang - The language to translate to
        Returns:
        The translated string

        TranslationException

      • canDetectLanguage

        boolean canDetectLanguage()
        Used by the TranslationManager internally
        Returns:
        Whether this translation provider can detect a language from text

      • detectLangauge

        Method to detect the language from a string, only used if canDetectLanguage() returns true
        Parameters:
        text - String to translate
        Returns:
        The language

        java.io.IOException
